result.eng: Strangely enough, she got her education in England and not in Ireland.
result.ga: Aisteach go leor ba i Sasana a fuair sí a cuid scolaíochta agus ní in Éirinn
result.orig: Aisteach go leor ba i Sasana a fuair sí a cuid scolaíochta agus ní in Éirinn
result.html: Aisteach go leor ba i Sasana a fuair sí a cuid scolaíochta agus ní in ÉirinnStrangely enough, she got her education in England and not in Ireland.
result.ponchtml: Aisteaċ go leor ba i Sasana a fuair sí a cuid scolaíoċta agus ní in ÉirinnStrangely enough, she got her education in England and not in Ireland.

result.eng: He works in the Department of Education.
result.ga: Tá sé ag obair sa Roinn Oideachais
result.orig: Tá sé ag obair sa Roinn Oideachais
result.html: Tá sé ag obair sa Roinn OideachaisHe works in the Department of Education.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé ag obair sa Roinn OideaċaisHe works in the Department of Education.

result.eng: I didn't have a chance to get an education.
result.ga: Ní raibh seans agam foghlaim a fháil
result.orig: Ní raibh seans agam foghlaim a fháil
result.html: Ní raibh seans agam foghlaim a fháilI didn't have a chance to get an education.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ seans agam foġlaim a ḟáilI didn't have a chance to get an education.

result.eng: The Department of Education will prepare a development plan.
result.ga: Ullmhóidh an Roinn Oideachais plean forbartha
result.orig: Ullmhóidh an Roinn Oideachais plean forbartha
result.html: Ullmhóidh an Roinn Oideachais plean forbarthaThe Department of Education will prepare a development plan.
result.ponchtml: Ullṁóiḋ an Roinn Oideaċais plean forbarṫaThe Department of Education will prepare a development plan.

result.eng: It's a shame I didn't get an education when I was young.
result.ga: Ba mhór an truaighe nach bhfuair mé foghlaim i m'óige
result.orig: Ba mhór an truaighe nach bhfuair mé foghlaim i m'óige
result.html: Ba mhór an truaighe nach bhfuair mé foghlaim i m'óigeIt's a shame I didn't get an education when I was young.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁór an truaiġe naċ ḃfuair mé foġlaim i m'óigeIt's a shame I didn't get an education when I was young.

result.eng: The man got a college education.
result.html: Fuair an fear foghlaim coláisteThe man got a college education.
result.ponchtml: Fuair an fear foġlaim coláisteThe man got a college education.

result.eng: They gave me as much education as they could afford.
result.ga: Thug siad scoil agus léann domh ar feadh a n-acmhainne
result.orig: Thug siad scoil agus léann domh ar feadh a n-acmhainne
result.html: Thug siad scoil agus léann domh ar feadh a n-acmhainneThey gave me as much education as they could afford.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug siad scoil agus léann doṁ ar feaḋ a n-acṁainneThey gave me as much education as they could afford.
